headline: Archer-Daniels-Midland (ADM): Assessing Valuation After Soy Protein Network Restructuring and Facility Closure
summary: Archer-Daniels-Midland has just set another strategic marker, announcing a plan to reshape its global soy protein production network. The company is consolidating operations and ceasing activities at its Bushnell, Illinois facility, pivoting instead to leverage operational strength at upgraded sites such as the recommissioned Decatur plant. For investors, this signals more than just cost-cutting, as ADM is explicitly aiming to boost efficiency and sharpen its ability to meet worldwide demand...
